REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Cave tender
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: While the others were out hunting and foraging, [PAWN_nameDef] would stay at home to cook and take care of the young and sick.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Digger
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] tribe carved their home deep into the side of a mountain. [PAWN_nameDef] feels most at home picking through rock and shoring up cave walls.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Gatherer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a master gatherer. [PAWN_pronoun] can find food in the most barren of places using [PAWN_possessive] deep knowledge of plants, roots, and berries.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Healer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After [PAWN_possessive] tribe's elder healer was killed in a raid, [PAWN_nameDef] took on the role. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days scrounging up herbs and mineral compounds from the nearby area to use in surprisingly effective remedies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Loner
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never much liked the tribal council or the yearly festivals. [PAWN_pronoun] prefers the open plain and the lonely whistle of wind through the rocks. [PAWN_pronoun] visits [PAWN_possessive] tribe from time to time, but for the most part [PAWN_pronoun] takes care of [PAWN_objective]self using [PAWN_possessive] own survival skills.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Lore keeper
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of a long line of lore keepers in [PAWN_possessive] tribe. Every night around the fire, [PAWN_pronoun] would pass on ancient knowledge and helpful wisdom through stories.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Muffalo shaman
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Because of [PAWN_possessive] quiet wisdom and great strength, [PAWN_nameDef] became the spiritual leader for a nomadic tribe that followed the herds of roaming muffalo.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Scout
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Since [PAWN_possessive] tribe has made contact with local outlanders, [PAWN_nameDef] has contracted [PAWN_possessive] services out as a guide to the local area. Frequent contact with ancient relics has made [PAWN_objective] fairly comfortable with the old technology.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Warrior
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fearsome warrior, proficient with many weapons. [PAWN_pronoun] participated in many battles.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Weaver
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an expert at working muffalo wool, plant fibres and natural dyes into beautiful clothing for [PAWN_possessive] kin. [PAWN_possessive] beautiful handicrafts were traded frequently between local tribes.
